title: error: internal compiler error: src/value_and_place.rs:160:38: Please use load_scalar for ByVal

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-cranelift
labels.description: Things relevant to the [future] cranelift backend

body:
### Code (No code) I'm trying to compile latest helix version to try rustc_codegen_cranelift. Apparently the ropey 1.5.0 dependency breaks. I don't know if I should post here this, I'm just following orders from the stacktrace. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.61.0 (fe5b13d68 2022-05-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: fe5b13d681f25ee6474be29d748c65adcd91f69e commit-date: 2022-05-18 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.61.0 LLVM version: 14.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
